inclusion.criterion: Subject is expected to undergo cardiac surgery in ≤90 days including at least one of the following:
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject's cardiac surgery will be performed by a study investigator.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject will be ≥18 years old at the time of their annuloplasty implant(s).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject provides written informed consent and agrees to comply with all required study visits and procedures.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Subject is below the age of legal consent in the applicable jurisdiction or otherwise lacks legal authority to provide informed consent.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subject is unable to read or write or has a mental illness or disability that impairs their ability to provide written informed consent.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subject is expected to have active endocarditis at the time of their Abbott annuloplasty device implant(s).
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Marfan's syndrome and severe mitral valve prolapse with regurgitation, but remains symptomatic and is prepared to undergo surgery. EF of 65% on TTE.
